sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import axios from 'axios'; const CheckoutForm = () => { const [boats, setBoats] = useState([]); const [ratings, setRatings] = useState([]); const [user, setUser] = useState({ wycnumber: 12345 }); // Assume user is logged in and has a session useEffect(() => { axios.get('http://localhost:3001/api/boats') .then(response => setBoats(response.data)) .catch(error => console.error('Error fetching boats:', error)); axios.get(`http://localhost:3001/api/ratings?wycnumber=${user.wycnumber}`) .then(response => setRatings(response.data)) .catch(error => console.error('Error fetching ratings:', error)); }, [user]); const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ boat: '', rating: '', chiefId: '', destination: '', otherDest: '', timeDeparture: new Date().toISOString().slice(0, 16), expectedReturn: new Date(Date.now() + 2 * 60 * 60 * 1000).toISOString().slice(0, 16), crew: [], guests: [] }); const handleInputChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; setFormData({ ...formData, [name]: value }); }; const addCrewMember = (id) => { setFormData({ ...formData, crew: [...formData.crew, id] }); }; const addGuest = (guest) => { setFormData({ ...formData, guests: [...formData.guests, guest] }); }; const handleSubmit = () => { console.log('Submitting form:', formData); // Here you would make a POST request to your backend with the formData }; return (

WYC Boat Checkout Form

Return to the main page

Weather

  • Wind is appropriate for my rating - Check Forecast / Posted Signs

Boat Selection:

Select the class of boat you are checking out and then select the applicable rating you have for this boat and the current weather conditions

If one of your ratings is not showing up, reach out to the Chief/Ratings Examiner/Instructor to get it updated

Special Permissions

If you are taking out a boat during a supervised sailing event or lesson under an Instructor, a Chief, or a Ratings Examiner, enter their ID number to gain special checkout permissions.

Destination:

Novice and Intermediate - Union Bay only!

Time

Crew:

addCrewMember(e.target.value)}/> {formData.crew.map((crew, index) => ( ))}
WYC ID# Name Status Expiration
{crew} Name Status Expiration

Guests:

{formData.guests.map((guest, index) => ( ))}
Name Status Email Phone
updateGuest(index, 'name', e.target.value)}/> updateGuest(index, 'email', e.target.value)}/> updateGuest(index, 'phone', e.target.value)}/>
); function updateGuest(index, field, value) { const newGuests = [...formData.guests]; newGuests[index][field] = value; setFormData({ ...formData, guests: newGuests }); } }; export default CheckoutForm;
